snippet: For school officials and policy makers grappling with rising enrollment and decreased state revenue, the primary target is the cost of personnel.
lead_paragraph: For school officials and policy makers grappling with rising enrollment and decreased state revenue, the primary target is the cost of personnel.

headline.seo: Texas Schools Zero In on Employee Numbers
headline.main: In Hard Times, Schools Zero In on Employees
headline.print_headline: In Hard Times, Schools Zero In On Employees
